solution_line_template: Jewel's gain for each magazine is ${magazine_sell_price} - ${magazine_cost} = $<<{magazine_sell_price}-{magazine_cost}={gain_per_magazine}>>{gain_per_magazine}.
Thus, her total gain will be ${gain_per_magazine} x {num_magazines} = $<<{gain_per_magazine}*{num_magazines}={total_gain}>>{total_gain}.
